para.verbatim: It initializes the client to /user_interface, then checks the input genrated by th user if it's 1 sends a "start" message, otherwise it sends a "stop" message

.. module:: user_interface :platform: Unix :synopsis: Python module for the user Interface
.. moduleauthor:: Alessio Roda alessioroda98@gmail.com
This node implements an user interface
Service: /user_interface
It's the node that provides a very simple user interface to pilot the robot, so that
if user press 1 the node sends a "start" message to the user_interface server if user press 0 the node sends a "stop" message to the user_interface server
